description:
Dead Fun Pack: Penguins and Aliens Strikes Again is a collection for those who love challenges, including Run Run and Die and Mutant Alien Moles of the Dead. 

Both games, designed by Pixel Bones Studio, offer very simple playability and a colorful look, while challenging the playerâ€™s reflexes. 

Are you ready to take on the madcap challenges in this Dead Fun Pack?
name: Dead Fun Pack: Penguins and Aliens Strikes Again
